action.action-desc: Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia (for herself and Mr. Bishop) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude military bonuses from gross income.

subsection.text: Subsection (a) of section 134 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking any qualified military benefit and inserting any bonus paid to a member of the uniformed services under chapter 5 of title 37, United States Code, or any qualified military benefit.
The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
